q_en: Which cutting tasks use Cotton Fabric?

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT wg.name AS working_group_name, c.customer_name AS customer_name FROM working_group wg JOIN cutting_tasks ct ON wg.id = ct.working_group_id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id JOIN product_material pm ON op.product_id = pm.product_id JOIN materials m ON pm.material_id = m.id WHERE wg.name = 'Expert Cutters' AND m.name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: To find the working group members who use 'Cotton Fabric' and belong to the 'Expert Cutters' group, we need to join the necessary tables and filter the results based on the given conditions.
